Row.Text: Cannot declear war on City-states or surprise wars.[NEWLINE]Pastures and Plantations triggers Culture Bombs, and +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +1 [ICON_Food] Food, +1 Appeal.
Mondstadt unique recon unit that replaces the Skirmisher. Available from the start of the game. Can scale cliff walls, +2 [ICON_Movement] Movement when staring a turn on Hills or Cliffs.

Replaces the Government Plaza and cheaper to build. Provides regional Defence equal to an Encampment.[NEWLINE]Cities on the same continent with your original [ICON_Capital] Capital gain +1 [ICON_Amenities] Amenities whenever you are not at war with any civilization.

Gneshin Impact unique building that replaces the Monument. Provides an additional +4 [ICON_Faith] Faith.[NEWLINE]Units recover 10 Health when moving to a Statue of the Seven.[NEWLINE]Melee, Ranged, Anti-calvary, and Civilian units can Teleport between cities with Statue of the Seven.

Unlocks the Builder ability to constrcut a Adventurers' Guild, unique to Genshin Impact.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +3 [ICON_Gold] Gold to this tile and all adjacent unimproved tiles; +25% combat experience for all land units trained in this city. One per city. Tiles with Adventurers' Guild cannot be swapped.
